channel.title: Work History on Rusty Eddy
channel.description: Recent content in Work History on Rusty Eddy

item.title: Eddy Consulting, LLC
item.description: Worked with clients to scope project requirements, establish budgets and schedules, design software architecture and lead teams of engineers through entire software development lifecycles. Project work included but not limited to C; C++; Python; PHP; JavaScript; Java & MySQL.

item.title: Radian Laser
item.description: Responsible for the design, development and support of numerous company software projects, including but not limited to control systems firmware, single page apps for operational concerns. Development involved C/C++, Go and Python primarily. MicroServices and distributed communication design where large parts of the work we do.

item.title: Cloud Trek
item.description: Cloud Automation with Ansible and CloudStack. Automate the installation and provisioning of Linux hosts with ansible.

item.title: DirecTV / AT&T
item.description: Architectural lead, and software development lead for a new Software Defined Networking Multicast Route Controller. Contributed to the OpenSource SDN controller project ONOS.

item.title: Cisco Systems
item.description: Original member of the Multicast Routing team. Team of 12 responsible for the design, implementation and testing the complete suite of Multicast Routing protocols for the Cisco Carrier Routing System (CRS). Worked this project from early design through product launch into maintenance.

item.title: USC ~ ISI
item.description: Led the effort to add IGMP/PIM and Multicast Routing Information Base (MRIB) to the Open Source GateD suite of routing protocols. Lead graduate students and others that would eventually become prominent members of the computer networking community.

item.title: Retix
item.description: Promoted to lead the team of 6 engineers that developed and automated test plans for L2 switches, OSPF, RIP and BGP

item.title: Rockwell, Intl. Space Systems Division
item.description: Lead Sysadmin: lead a team of 5 Sysadmins responsible for the use and well being of Engineering Departments 300+ UNIX workstations, servers (Sun, HP, DEC) and network.

item.title: California State University ~ Chancelors Office
item.description: I was hired by the CSU Chancellors Office for a “special” project, a habit I seem to have gotten myself into regularly over the years.
